message: Intentional design. Each product post has its own hub card fields, not a repeater.
Fixed nav links by targeting only anchor elements with data-scroll attribute, added cache-busting.
Services grid now queries child products of current post. No children means no section.
Enabled hierarchical products. After deploy, select Parent in Product Attributes sidebar when editing.
Added active toggle per nav item. Applies 'active' class for styling. Show toggle already exists.
Removed editor and thumbnail from products CPT. Only title, excerpt, page-attributes remain.
Moved counters section to render after the child products grid as requested.
Added Children Grid tab with subtitle and title fields. Section header now configurable per product.
